com.psddev.dari.util

Class Utf8Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractFilter
      • com.psddev.dari.util.Utf8Filter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class Utf8Filter
extends AbstractFilter
    Forces StringUtils.UTF_8 character encoding on all requests and responses.
